articles.title: Meet the mysterious 'Accident' that has left the astronomers baffled - Times Now
articles.description: Is it a star? Is it a planet? 'The Accident' in the Milky Way Galaxy is a brown dwarf that has stumped NASA scientists.
articles.content:
• WISEA J153429.75-104303.3 is a brown dwarf that has been nicknamed 'The Accident'.
  • NASA says 'The Accident' is like no other object found in the Milky Way Galaxy.

articles.content:
China's moon-sampling mission spacecraft is continuing its extended mission with its destination currently unknown.
